name: domain-analysis-types
description: Package containing project-related types relevant for multiple services.

scripts.bda-types-for-children: npm i && npm pack && cd ../../services/statistics-service && npm uninstall domain-analysis-types && npm i ../../shared-node-modules/domain-analysis-types/domain-analysis-types-1.0.0.tgz && cd ../../services/dashboard && npm uninstall domain-analysis-types && npm i ../../shared-node-modules/domain-analysis-types/domain-analysis-types-1.0.0.tgz

author: Lucas Larisch
